name: Asteria software
overview:
Asteria software is developing the Personal Healthcare Portal www.heilsufar.is

Communication is key to better health and better healthcare.

No one is more aware of your health than yourself. You should therefore have the opportunity to access your own health related data and be able to make informed decisions regarding those matters.

Heilsufar.is will be the Icelandic portal where you can request you data to be sent to, where you can add your own information and where you can analyze and compare your health to others. You will control your data and you will access it on your web or your mobile when needed.

By participation in maintaining your health record the healthcare industry will also be able to provide better service based on more and better information.

Heilsufar.is is about modernizing the area of personal healthcare information. Maximize your health by being active.
